name: Wolf's Wool [In Development]
description:
Everyone in The Brightlands has the same wolf’s wool covering them, protecting them, and keeping them acceptably happy under the gaze of the eternal sun.  So why does the wool feel so heavy? And what happens when it starts to fall apart?

Wolf's Wool is an abstract visual novel about wondering what you are under the crumbling cover. Created for Nonbinary Game Jam 2021!

Things to take Note of:

  • 7000+ words / About 20 mins of gameplay!
  • 3 Endings!
  • Abstract words and art!
  • Content warning: Some topics touched upon is suicide ideation, societal pressure, and being uncomfortable in your body and how it looks.

PLEASE NOTE: As of now, there are no sfx or music placed and there are still a lot of edits and polish that needs to be done, especially towards the end of the story. I am deciding to do a soft release for now because it's practically done and playable, so keep this in mind if you decide to download it now! I will be able to craft a more full and more polished experience later. I would appreciate any feedback you can give!
